doc.title: Lieut. Bagley's Funeral. Escort of Lieut. Bagley's at Raleigh, N. C.
doc.plot: We have produced in a film the funeral cortege of brave Bagley, who fought valiantly against great odds and unfortunately lost his life. All hail to this hero! His name will live after him. This film is a masterpiece of the photographic art, and you want it by all means in your collection of war subjects.
